Title: Authorizes active members of the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to purchase service credit for service with the Long Island Railroad Company police department
Summary: Authorizes active members of the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to purchase service credit for service with the Long Island Railroad Company police department.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing active members of the New York state and local police and fire retirement system to purchase service credit for service with the Long Island Railroad Company police department
